name: Leave Allocations
query:
select la.employee as 'كود الموظف::100', la.employee_name as 'إسم الموظف::300', 
sum(if(lt.leave_name="إعتيادى", la.new_leaves_allocated,0)) as 'إعتيادى::150', 
sum(if(lt.leave_name="عارضة", la.new_leaves_allocated,0)) as 'عارضة::150', 
sum(if(la.leave_type="أجازة مرضى", la.new_leaves_allocated,0)) as 'مرضى::150', 
sum(if(lt.leave_name="إعتيادى", la.carry_forwarded_leaves,0)) as 'إعتيادية مرحلة::150'
from `tabLeave Allocation` la
left join `tabLeave Type` lt on la.leave_type=lt.name
where la.docstatus=1 and la.from_date>=concat(%(year)s,'-01-01') and la.to_date<=concat(%(year)s,'-12-31')
and la.employee in (select name from `tabEmployee` where status='Active' and company=%(company)s and business_unit=%(business_unit)s)
group by employee
